string.value: Doctor Bing says that he has some big news.\r\nGo see Doctor Bing in his laboratory.
You received information about the Mothership's crash from Doctor Bing.\r\nFind Doctor Bing's forces and head over to the Mothership crash site.
You received information from Wynn, who was analyzing the Mothership at the crash site.
You're here! One of the motherships have finally crashed!\r\n#L0##bHave you gone inside yet?#l\n#k
Not yet. My troops are guarding it now. Wynn is on site analyzing the mothership.\r\n#L0##bI would like to go inside.#l\n#k
Very well. Search for my troops. They'll lead you to Wynn at the crash site.
Wynn can tell you the analysis results, too. I'll see you there.
You know, there are others who want to venture into the mothership, too. You should be grateful for the opportunity...
Isn't it amazing?! It's odd, though, that the mothership crashed at such a convenient time for us. Almost feels...intentional.\r\n#L0##bHave you examined the interior of the ship yet?#l\n#k
Not completely. We know that the inside is constructed of large Cubes. How they work...is anyone's guess.\r\n#L0##bI should enter and investigate.#l\n#k
We do know this. The Cubes in the ship are connected by portals.\r\n#L0##bThey're even connected to those ships in the sky?#l\n#k
We should be able to use this knowledge to our advantage.\r\nBut first, accept the 5th official mission issued by the OSSS.
Okay, talk to me again so that I can give you the mission.
